description: ISO-20022 Account Management Identity Verification Request schema for ChainBridge KYB compliance

schema_notes.purpose: This schema maps KYB identity documents to ISO-20022 standard for ChainBridge enterprise settlement platform
schema_notes.usage: P165 phase will populate document_shards with cryptographic hashes of verified business documents
schema_notes.security: All document references MUST be cryptographic hashes. NO PLAIN TEXT ALLOWED.
schema_notes.verification: Requires 3-of-5 HSM quorum signature for activation
schema_notes.fail_mode: System operates in FAIL_CLOSED mode - any verification failure terminates operations
